testcase.purpose: Test SpeechRecognition constructor is valid
Test the default grammars is not null
Test the default length of grammars is 0
Test the default lang is null string
Test the default continuous is false
Test the default maxAlternatives is 1
Test getting an exception when calling start() in the Speech JavaScript API
Test the basics of the SpeechRecognitionError interface
Test SpeechGrammar constructor is valid
Test default weight of SpeechGrammar
Test default src of SpeechGrammar
Test setting the weight attribute of SpeechGrammar
Test setting the src attribute of SpeechGrammar 1
Test setting the src attribute of SpeechGrammar 2
Test setting the src attribute of SpeechGrammar 3
Test SpeechGrammarList constructor is valid
Test default length of SpeechGrammarList
Test item(0) of SpeechGrammarList is null
Test SpeechGrammarList[0] is undefined
Test item(-1) of SpeechGrammarList is null
Test SpeechGrammarList[-1] is undefined
Test the actual length attributes of SpeechGrammarList after adding one 1
Test the actual item(1) of SpeechGrammarList is null after adding one
Test the actual SpeechGrammarList[1] is undefined after adding one
Test the actual item(-1) of SpeechGrammarList is null after adding one
Test the actual SpeechGrammarList[-1] is undefined after adding one
Test the item(0) of SpeechGrammarList equals SpeechGrammarList[0]
Test the src attribute of the actual item(0) of SpeechGrammarList
Test the weight attribute of the actual item(0) of SpeechGrammarList
Test the actual length attributes of SpeechGrammarList after adding one 2
Test the item(1) of SpeechGrammarList equals SpeechGrammarList[1]
Test the src attribute of the actual item(1) of SpeechGrammarList
Test the weight attribute of the actual item(1) of SpeechGrammarList
Test the actual length attributes of SpeechGrammarList after adding one 3
Test the item(2) of SpeechGrammarList equals SpeechGrammarList[2]
Test the src attribute of the actual item(2) of SpeechGrammarList
Test the weight attribute of the actual item(2) of SpeechGrammarList
Test the src attribute of the SpeechGrammarList[2]
Test the weight attribute of the SpeechGrammarList[2]
Test checks if SpeechRecognition interface works well
Test checks if SpeechSynthesis interface works well
Test a speech job will generate the correct boundary events
Test that cancelling a speech job fires the right events
Test that pausing/resuming speech jobs works as expected
Test that the basic mechanisms of speaking text work, including sending the job and receving the callback
Test that passing an argument other than a SpeechSynthesisUtterance to speechSynthesis.speak throws a TypeError exception
Test that can get synthesizer voices from SpeechSynthesisUtterance
Test that can get synthesizer voices from SpeechSynthesis
Test if the confidence represents a numeric estimate between 0 and 1 of how confident the recognition system is that the recognition is correct
Test if the user agent must return zero or more final results representing multiple consecutive recognitions in response to starting recognition when the continuous attribute is set to true
Test if the ErrorCode of SpeechRecognitionError is language-not-supported when the language was not supported
Test if the message of SpeechRecognitionError is null when no speech was detected
Test if emma attribute is EMMA 1.0 representation of this result
Test if the interpretation represents the semantic meaning from what the user said, current options are null or a copy of the transcript
Test if the resultIndex is set to the lowest index in the results array that has changed
Test if interim results will be returned when the interim attribute is set to true
Test if default to use the lang of the html document root element when the input request opens a connection to the recognition service
Test if the maximum number of SpeechRecognitionAlternatives per result is 0 when set maxAlternatives attribute to be 0
Test if the final boolean is set to true if this is the final time the speech service will return this particular index value
Test if item returns null when index is greater than or equal to length
Test if the long attribute represents how many n-best alternatives are represented in the item array
Test if item returns null when index is greater than or equal to length
Test if item returns null when index is greater than or equal to length
Test if character index into the original utterance string that most closely approximates the current speaking position of the speech engine
Test if name should return undefined for start event
Test if fired if there was an error that prevented successful speaking of this utterance
Test if default to use the lang of the html document root element
Test if fired when this utterance has begun to be spoken
Test if fired when and if this utterance is paused mid-utterance
Test if pitch is a default of 1
Test if pitch is 0 being the lowest pitch
Test if pitch is 2 being the highest pitch
Test if rate is a default of 1
Test if rate is 0.1 being the lowest rate
Test if rate is 10 being the highest rate
Test if fired when and if this utterance is resumed after being paused mid-utterance
Test if fired when this utterance has begun to be spoken
Test if text can be a complete, well-formed SSML document
Test if volume is a default of 1
Test if volume is 0 being the lowest volume
Test if volume is 1 being the highest volume
Test if item returns null when index is greater than or equal to length
Check if getVoices method of SpeechSynthesis works properly with extra argument
Check if cancel method of SpeechSynthesis works properly with extra argument
Check if addFromURI method of SpeechGrammarList without optional argument works properly
Check if addFromURI method of SpeechGrammarList with all argument works properly
Check if addFromString method of SpeechGrammarList without optional argument works properly
Check if addFromString method of SpeechGrammarList with all argument works properly
Check if SpeechGrammerList object is extensible
Check if SpeechGrammer object is extensible
Check if speak method of SpeechSynthesis without argument throws an exception
Check if speak method of SpeechSynthesis returns value
Check if speak method of SpeechSynthesis exists
Check if resume method of SpeechSynthesis exists
Check if resume method of SpeechSynthesis returns value
Check if resume method of SpeechSynthesis works properly with extra argument
Check if pause method of SpeechSynthesis changes state of pause
